title: Killing of Alex Pretti by immigration agents fuels anger in traumatized Minneapolis
subhead: Two weeks after the death of Renee Good, Alex Pretti, a 37-year-old nurse, was killed during a confrontation between Border Patrol officers and residents in Minneapolis. Democrats are now threatening to block funding for the Department of Homeland Security, even if it means triggering another government shutdown.

title: Why the Israeli army doubts Hamas can be demilitarized
Left-wing primary starts to take shape ahead of 2027 French presidential election
Indian captain of suspected Russian shadow tanker in French custody
subhead: The French navy on Thursday intercepted the Grinch, an oil tanker suspected of being part of Russia's 'shadow fleet' that evades sanctions.

title: The challenge of medical access in rural Afghanistan: 'Before the clinic, three or four women died every month'
subhead: French photographer Elise Blanchard visited doctors, nurses and patients in Afghanistan's rural areas. After decades of war and under Taliban rule, women have faced extreme insecurity when it comes to healthcare.

title: Falling birth rate in France: 'We may be witnessing a period of very rapid and highly gendered social change'
subhead: The decline in the number of births should be seen in connection with the 'gender divergence' between increasingly progressive young women and increasingly conservative young men, observes economist Pauline Grosjean in her column.

title: Inside the workshop where dress forms are made
subhead: For 160 years, the French company Stockman has been handcrafting dress forms used by fashion designers, costume makers and aspiring stylists to refine their creations. This centuries-old expertise allows Stockman to meet custom requests from around the world.

Generative AI, psychiatry and the risks of self-service therapy
subhead: Millions of people use chatbots like ChatGPT to share their distress, and the scientific community has warned about the risks vulnerable people face. Generative AI has shaken up psychiatric consultations, fueled tech giants' ambitions and emerged as a credible tool for analyzing pathologies.

title: 'We were walking in blood': Iran's doctors recount crackdown on protesters
subhead: From crowded emergency rooms to apocalyptic scenes in Iranian cities, healthcare workers told Le Monde about the violence that descended on protesters calling for the end of the Iranian regime from January 8.

title: US seeks to use Alberta to destabilize Canada
subhead: The Trump administration and MAGA circles are closely watching the conservative, oil-rich province, particularly as a separatist movement has launched a campaign to organize an independence referendum.
